DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read your organization's authentication event listeners
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's authentication event listeners on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read your organization's authentication event listeners
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's authentication event listeners on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's authentication event listeners without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's authentication event listeners
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's authentication event listeners on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write your organization's authentication event listeners
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's authentication event listeners on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all authentication event listeners
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's authentication event listeners without a signed-in user.
